main.subtitle: Hello
main.title: I am Rashadul Islam
main.description: Frontend Web Developer from Dhaka, passionate about Laravel and React.js. Currently working at BDOSC as a Frontend Web Developer, I focus on building error-free web applications and solving real-world problems. I enjoy learning, sharing knowledge, and improving web performance. Skilled in ReactJS, JavaScript, and PHP, I'm also learning React Native, Node.js, Next.js, MongoDB, and Flutter. I love collaborating on Laravel and MERN Stack projects and exploring new places in my free time.

2025.title: Full Stack Web Developer
2025.description: Developed full-stack applications with Tailwind, JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NodeJS, Express, and MongoDB.

2023.title: Junior Frontend Developer
2023.description: Built responsive web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, and NodeJS.

2021.title: Web Development Level - 4
2021.description: Developed web applications and gained proficiency in HTML, CSS, and PHP.

2020.title: IT Manager
2020.description: Managed IT infrastructure and led a team of developers to implement key technology solutions.

whyChooseMeSection.title: Why Choose Me
whyChooseMeSection.description: I provide high-quality web solutions with a focus on modern technologies, clean code, and outstanding user experience.
whyChooseMeSection.contactdescription: Have any project idea contact with me

features.title: Clean & Modern Code
features.description: I write maintainable, scalable, and efficient code with best practices and modern technologies.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Every website I build is fully responsive and optimized for all devices and screen sizes.

features.title: Performance Optimization
features.description: I prioritize fast-loading websites with optimized assets and minimal latency.

features.title: SEO Friendly
features.description: My projects are structured and coded with SEO best practices to improve visibility on search engines.

features.title: Strong Communication
features.description: I ensure clear, transparent communication and timely updates throughout the project.
